# Feature with Multiple Scenarios

Test fixture for validating output indentation with multiple scenarios.

## First Scenario

This is the first scenario with its own steps.

levels: e2e

```specguard
Step one of first scenario
Step two of first scenario
```

## Second Scenario

This is the second scenario with different steps.

levels: e2e

```specguard
Step one of second scenario
Step two of second scenario
Step three of second scenario
```

## Third Scenario

This is the third scenario.

levels: e2e

```specguard
Step one of third scenario
```
